items.description: New to OpenSpell? Here's everything you need to know to get the game running and start playing.
items.content:
Welcome to OpenSpell! This guide will help you get the game up and running quickly.

Quick Start (Docker)

The easiest way to run OpenSpell is with Docker. Open a terminal in the project folder and run these commands:

  1. Generate config files:
    $env:ENV_MODE="docker"; docker compose --env-file config/docker.env --profile init run --rm env-init
  2. Set up the database:
    docker compose --env-file config/docker.env --profile migrate run --rm migrate
  3. Start everything:
    docker compose --env-file config/docker.env up -d --build

Play the Game

  1. Open http://localhost:8887 in your browser
  2. Click Play
  3. Select World 1
  4. Log in or create an account

Default Admin Account

A test admin account is created automatically:

  • Username: admin
  • Password: admin123

Made Changes to the Code?

Docker containers have a copy of the code from when they were built. After editing files, rebuild the container:

  • Web changes: docker compose --env-file config/docker.env up -d --build web
  • API changes: docker compose --env-file config/docker.env up -d --build api
  • Game changes: docker compose --env-file config/docker.env up -d --build game

Need Help?

Check the README.md file in the project root for detailed documentation, troubleshooting tips, and advanced configuration options.
